content.raw: I tried installing `ignition-blueprint` with the prerelease repo enabled and the resulting simulation was quite laggy. I removed the prerelease repo, removed all ignition packages, installed `ignition-blueprint` back (this time using the stable repo), enabled the prerelease repo, installed `libignition-physics-dartsim` and `libdart6-external-odelcpsolver`. After that everything seems to work well.
content.html: I tried installing ignition-blueprint with the prerelease repo enabled and the resulting simulation was quite laggy. I removed the prerelease repo, removed all ignition packages, installed ignition-blueprint back (this time using the stable repo), enabled the prerelease repo, installed libignition-physics-dartsim and libdart6-external-odelcpsolver. After that everything seems to work well.
